SEARCH
Package nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.app

Class Keys

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.app.Keys
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyListener, EventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
Controller
class Keys extends Object implements KeyListener
Keys class to handle key events This class was adopted from the swen 225 assignment 1 with some modifications to handle key combinations, and pause method. note for us: Swing cannot handle key combinations like Ctrl+X as a single key event, so we need to use KeyStroke class to handle it. keystroke is a combination of key code and modifiers, which is part of swing library (but came from awt). I could combine this class into Controller class, However, separating this class from Controller class increases the readability of the code. and make this class reusable in the future.
Author:
Nagare Negishi
